channel.title: test on hohoho
channel.description: Recent content in test on hohoho

item.title: 哀
item.description: 我愛燕魚！ 可以發大財了嗎？ library(knitr);library(kableExtra);library(tidyverse) mtcars %>% kable() kable(mtcars,"html") %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = F) kable(mtcars,"html") %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = F, position = "float_right") %>% scroll_box(width = "300px", height = "500px") kable(mtcars,"html") %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = F, position = "float_right") %>% scroll_box(width = "300px", height = "500px") 紅藕香

item.title: 這是第一篇文測試
item.description: 我愛燕魚！ 可以發大財了嗎？ library(knitr);library(kableExtra);library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ---------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## √ ggplot2 3.2.1 √ purrr 0.3.3 ## √ tibble 2.1.3 √ dplyr 0.8.3 ## √ tidyr 1.0.0 √ stringr 1.4.0 ## √ readr 1.3.1 √ forcats 0.4.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::group_rows() masks kableExtra::group_rows() ## x dplyr::lag() masks
